extension_description.message: Highlights and remembers text on web pages

page_action_title_not_in_dom.message: Unable to match all highlights on the page

confirm_remove_all_highlights.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove all the highlights on this page?

tooltip_copy_highlight.message: Copy the highlighted text to the Clipboard

confirm_remove_all_pages.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove all highlights on all pages?

pages_empty.message: Nothing to see here, move along

confirm_reset_default_styles.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to restore the default styles?

confirm_remove_style.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove this style?

options_tab_page_header_sites.message: These are the highlight styles available to be applied to text. Click on them to edit their properties.

options_tab_page_header_pages.message: These pages are marked as containing highlights. When you revisit them, with any luck they should reappear where you left them.

highlight_help_keyboard_shortcut.message: A keyboard shortcut can be assigned to any of the first 10 styles. Use the 'Keyboard shortcuts' option, located at the bottom right of Chrome's main 'Extensions' page (also accessible via the Tools menu).

alert_create_highlight_in_subframe.message: Creating a highlight within a subframe of a page is currently unsupported.

alert_create_highlight_in_editable.message: Unable to create a highlight within an editable text box.
